Translations.Text: Ini: "ilit d azou ne$ d uzzal

ne$ d lxelq id iusan deg idmaren nnwen". A d inin: "anwa ara a $ d irren"? Ini: "d Win ikwen id Ixelqen, abrid amenzu". Ad huzen iqweooa nnsen $uoek, ad inin: "melmi ayagi"? Ini: "izmer ad yili iqeob ed
Ass ideg ara awen d Isiwel, a d tjawbem s ccekoan iS, a p$ilem cwii kan ay teqqimem
Ini i imdanen iw ad inin awal ifuqen. Cciian, s tidep, isskar ameoei garasen. Ih, Cciian d acengu n uuee i umdan
Mass nnwen Yif akw akken ikwen Issen. Ad Ieun fellawen, ma Ib$a; a kwen Iaaqeb ma Ib$a. Ur k id Nuzen ara d awkil nnsen
Mass ik Yif akw akken Ieoa i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ni$ Nesmenyaf kra n lambiyya i wiyav. I Dawed Nefka Ihellilen
Ini: "nujet $eo wid tepkabarem, war Neppa. Ur zmiren ad awen kksen ccqa, ne$ a t bedlen
Wigi u$uo la pnujun, la pqelliben ppawil ara ten isqeoben nezzeh ar Mass nnsen. Ssaramen aeunu S, ppagwaden aaaqeb iS". Ih, aaaqeb n Mass ik, issagwad
Ur telli temdint ur Nesquccu, uqbel ass n tnekra, ne$ ur Naaqeb s leqsee. Ayagi iura di Tezmamt
I £ iiifen $ef uceggaa issekniyen, d nnkeo nnsen, kan, s$uo imezwura. Nuzen ed tal$wemt i Tamud, d ayen pwalin. Densen p. Ur d Neppazen issekniyen siwa i ussigwed
Mi k Nenna: "Mass ik, s tidep, Izzi i imdanen". Ma dayen i k Nerra teeoiv t, d ahewwel kan i medden. Akken ttejoa tamenault di Leqwoan. Nessagwad iten. Ay sen d irennu siwa nnfaq ameqwoan
Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis. Inna: "day ad knu$ i win Txelqev s talaxt
Inna: "Twalav wagi i Tauzzev sennig iw, lemmer a yi Teooev, ar ass n tnekra, war ccekk, ad $wu$ tarwa s, siwa ixeiiayen
Inna: "Oue! Wid, segsen, i iddan yidek, ihi, aqeiii nnwen d Loahennama, d aqeiii meqqwoen
Laaaj win iwumi tzemoev, degsen, s ta$wect ik. £ewwes fellasen s imnayen ik, d iterrasen ik. Ecrek yidsen ayla, tarwa. Aahed asen". I yasen iaahed Cciian, siwa a$uoou
Ma d imdanen iW, ur tesaiv adabu fellasen". Mass ik Iqadd d Awkil
Mass nnwen, i wen Isseleayen lbabuo di yill, a pnadim lfevl iS. Ih, Neppa Ipeunu fellawen
Ma tevoa yidwen lmuuiba di yill, ayen u$uo tepnujum, war Neppa, ittellif. Mi kwen Isellek ar lberr, twexxoem. Amdan izga d lkaraa
Day t$ilem ur Ipseggix ara tamurt yiswen, ne$ ur awen d Ippazen ara tabucivant, d$a ur teppafem awkil
Ne$ day t$ilem ur kwen id Ippara ara tikelt nniven, ad awen d Iazen aueouao, a kwen I$mes ilmend n tijehli nnwen, sinna ur teppafem, mgal a£, amalal
